articles.title: Five takeaways from Indiana's overtime loss to Illinois - Inside the Hall
articles.description: Indiana fell to Illinois 75-71 in overtime on Tuesday night and dropped to 9-8 overall and 4-6 in the Big Ten.
articles.content:
